description: A windows dock for the GNOME Shell - displays live thumbnails for windows of the running applications, thus improving the multitasking experience for those users who need it. Panel can be aligned to the left or to the right side of the screen. It also can be configured to autohide and to show thumbnails for all running windows or for minimized ones.
name: WinThumbnails
